metadata.title: CVE-2022-1987 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Buffer Over-read in GitHub repository bfabiszewski/libmobi prior to 0.11.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1987` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmobi-tools - 0.11+dfsg-1
libmobi0 - 0.11+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmobi package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.11+dfsg-1').
